IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENHANCE, SUPPORT, AND PROMOTE CREATIVE AND CRITICAL THINKING AS WELL AS THE PROBLEM SOLVING SKILLS OF SCHOOL AGE LEARNERS IN THE MAKING OF ORIGINAL INVENTIONS AS AMAZING SOLUTIONS TO PUZZLING PROBLEMS WHILE MASTERING PENNSYLVANIA AND NATIONAL STANDARDS. THE SCHOOL'S MISSION ALSO EXTENDS TO NURTURING A LOVE, RESPECT, AND APPRECIATION FOR LIFE-LONG LEARNING. THE CHARTER SCHOOL'S ENROLLMENT IS FROM K THROUGH 12.
IRS990.Desc: TACONY ACADEMY REACHED ITS FULL CONFIGURATION OF GRADES K-12 WITH 1,075 STUDENTS. THE SCHOOL WAS AT FULL ENROLLMENT WITH A SIGNIFICANT WAIT LIST THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE CODE. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION OR LIABILITY FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE SCHOOL ADOPTED THE ACCOUNTING PRONOUNCEMENT RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS EFFECTIVE JULY 1, 2011. UPON ADOPTION OF THIS ACCOUNTING PRONOUNCEMENT, THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS. FURTHEMORE, THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AT JUNE 30, 2022. IN ADDITION, THE SCHOOL HAS NO INCOME TAX RELATED PENALTIES OR INTEREST FOR THE PERIODS REPORTED IN THESE FINIANCIAL STATEMENTS.
THE POLICY IS PUBLISHED AT THE BOTTOM OF EACH STUDENT APPLICATION AS WELL AS ANY DOCUMENTS RELEASED TO THE PUBLIC
TACONY ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL RECEIVES FEDERAL, STATE, AND LOCAL ASSISTANCE FOR THE OPERATION OF THEIR CHARTER SCHOOL.

TO ENHANCE, SUPPORT, AND PROMOTE CREATIVE AND CRITICAL THINKING AS WELL AS THE PROBLEM SOLVING SKILLS OF SCHOOL AGE LEARNERS IN THE MAKING OF ORIGINAL INVENTIONS AS AMAZING SOLUTIONS TO PUZZLING PROBLEMS WHILE MASTERING PENNSYLVANIA AND NATIONAL STANDARDS. THE SCHOOL'S MISSION ALSO EXTENDS TO NURTURING A LOVE, RESPECT, AND APPRECIATION FOR LIFE LONG LEARNING. THE CHARTER SCHOOL'S ENROLLMENT IS FROM K THROUGH 12.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, TOGETHER WITH THEIR FISCAL MANAGERS, REVIEW FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS FILE A STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL INTEREST ANNUALLY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD OF TRUSTEES/DIRECTORS APPROVES ALL COMPENSATION. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS USES COMPARABLE STATE AND LOCAL SALARY RANGES WHEN DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR THE SCHOOL'S EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAKES ALL GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST AS WELL AS ON ITS WEBSITE AND GUIDESTAR.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM LAST YEAR.

FRANKFORD VALLEY FOUNDATION FOR LITERACY II

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO SUPPORT THE TACONY ACADEMY CHARTER SCHOOL
